LanguageData.Bio_Heater.label: BIO-Heater spark
LanguageData.Bio_Heater.description: Phoenix's heart, which is connected to a life support system, requires frequent replacement of the hematogen due to the difference in the amount of nutrients in the blood.
LanguageData.Bio_coller.label: BIO-ice cooler
LanguageData.Bio_coller.description: Kirin's heart, which is connected to a life support system, due to the difference in the amount of nutrients in the blood, requires frequent replacement of the hematogen.
LanguageData.Bio_Sun.label: BIO-Dawn lamp
LanguageData.Bio_Sun.description: Having studied a number of technologies, we managed to revive the heart of the baguest, over the years it has accumulated a huge amount of light in the heart, now we can use it. It is necessary to connect to a life support system; due to the difference in the amount of nutrients in the blood, frequent replacement of hematogen is required.
LanguageData.Bio_PSY.label: BIO-Psi resonator
LanguageData.Bio_PSY.description: Behir's heart that creates psionic resonance,due to the difference in the amount of nutrients in the blood, requires frequent replacement of the hematogen.
LanguageData.Bio_cleaning.label: BIO- Toxin cleaning
LanguageData.Bio_cleaning.description: The heart of a wyvern can clear a large area of ​​toxins, but it takes time,due to the difference in the amount of nutrients in the blood, requires frequent replacement of the hematogen.
